articles.author: Arizona Republic, Ed Masley, Arizona Republic
articles.title: Crescent Ballroom celebrates 10 years of being 'your downtown Phoenix home' for live music
articles.description: When Charlie Levy and partners opened Crescent Ballroom it helped downtown Phoenix replace Tempe and the east Valley as the area's hub for live music.
articles.content:
Charlie Levy was living in Tucson when he started looking for a spot to open his own music venue. 
After years of bringing shows to other people's clubs across the state as the owner of Stateside Prâ€¦ [+8597 chars]
